item.title: [Python] Foreign Coding Interview Measures in the leetcode Era
item.description: Make a note of measures such as GAFAM or FAANG, or software engineer interview measures that tend to be similar to those (such as Indeed or PFN in Tokyo). #Coding interview and leetcode Foreign IT companies place great importance on coding interviews when hiring software engineers. It’s more like a programming contest problem, which is easier than business coding, and it seems common sense that American students and engineers take a few months of proactive measures when they receive an IT company.
